com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.modules.salesforce
Class SalesForceLogin

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.modules.salesforce.SalesForceLogin

public class SalesForceLogin
extends java.lang.Object

Class that logs into salesforce and provides the sessionID and server this login should use for the query

If there is a login failure, the getResponseXML() method will return the response

Constructor Summary
Constructor and Description
SalesForceLogin(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String pwd, java.lang.String login_server)
          Constructor does the login automatically
